name: Burger Sauce
description: Joshua Weissman–inspired In-N-Out–style burger sauce. Rich, tangy, and perfectly balanced. Makes enough for 6+ burgers.
gist: This sauce is best made exactly as written. It’s already dialed in.
ingredients:
1 large sweet onion (or 1–2 tbsp jarred caramelized onions, recommended)
90g mayo
65g ketchup
30g yellow mustard
1 finely diced dill pickle
6g Worcestershire sauce (~1/2 tbsp)
1 garlic clove, grated or pressed
Salt
Pepper
steps:
1. Mix together mayo, ketchup, mustard, and Worcestershire sauce.
2. Add the caramelized onion, pickle, and garlic.
3. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
4. Taste and adjust seasoning as needed.
notes: Using jarred caramelized onions saves significant time and works just as well in this sauce.
